original_text: But if God so clothes the grass, which is alive in the field today, and tomorrow is thrown into the oven, how much more will he clothe you, O you of little faith!
korean_text: 오늘 있다가 내일 아궁이에 던져지는 들풀도 하나님이 이렇게 입히시거든 하물며 너희일까보냐 믿음이 작은 자들아

sentences.original_text: But if God so clothes the grass
which is alive in the field today
and tomorrow is thrown into the oven
how much more will he clothe you
